source_sentence: 大方等大集經卷第五十五
translation: Dafangdengdaji jing, vol. 55

source_sentence: 高齊天竺三藏那連提耶舍譯
translation: A Translation of the Sanskrit Tripiṭaka of Nālandī Yeshiva by Gaoqi Tianzang

source_sentence: 月藏分第十二分布閻浮提品第十七
translation: Moon Treasury Section, Twelfth Chapter, Distribution, Yanfuti Chapter, Seventeenth Chapter

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊既知一切諸來大眾於三寶所皆生深信、尊重、敬仰，得未曾有，更不信事諸餘天已，告他化自在天王、化樂天王、兜率陀天王、須夜摩天王、帝釋天王、四大天王及諸眷屬、娑伽羅龍王、阿那婆達多龍王、羅睺羅阿修羅王、毘摩質多羅阿修羅王、睒婆利阿修羅王、跋持毘盧遮那阿修羅王、大樹緊那羅王、樂欲乾闥婆軍將、檀提鳩槃茶軍將、因陀羅夜叉軍將、寒葉餓鬼王、垂脣毘舍遮王、阿那竭囉富單那王、巷路喚聲迦吒富單那王等，作如是言：「諸仁者！
translation: Knowing that all the masses of people from all over the world had become deeply convinced of, respected, and venerated the Three Treasures like never before, and were no longer faithful to serve the other gods, the Bhagavān then addressed the gods Mahêśvara, Mahêśvara, Tuṣita, Sukhāma, Indra, the four great heavenly kings, their retinues, Sāgara, Anavatapta, Rāhula, Vimalacitra, Śubhakara, Vajra, Vairocana, Kisna, Mahādruma, Ganymede, Dantakubancha, Indra, the hungry ghosts, Vaiśāsana, Anākara, Avalokitêśvara, and Avalokitêśvara, saying, "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 汝等一切如是勸我，分布安置此閻浮提一切國土、城邑、宮殿、王都、聚落、山巖、寺舍、園池、曠野、諸樹林間，付囑護持勿令有惡。
translation: All of you thus advise me to distribute and settle all the lands, cities, palaces, royal capitals, villages, mountains, cliffs, temples, ponds, wildernesses, and woods of Jambudvīpa, and to instruct them to guard against evil.

source_sentence: 又令大地精氣、眾生精氣、正法精氣增長熾然。
translation: They also cause the vitality of the earth, the vitality of sentient beings, and the vitality of the right teaching to grow and flourish.

source_sentence: 佛正法眼久住於世，紹三寶種使不斷絕，損減惡趣增益善道，令此閻浮提一切安隱豐樂可樂。
translation: The Buddha's eye for the right Dharma will live in the world for a long time, introducing the seeds of the Three Treasures so that they won't be cut off, diminishing bad destinies and increasing good paths, so that all of Jambudvīpa will be peaceful, abundant, and enjoyable.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，我今分布此四天下，囑汝一切諸大天王、一切龍王，乃至一切迦吒富單那王，汝等各應發心捨離眷屬，分布安置護持養育，并汝諸天一切眷屬，乃至迦吒富單那王、一切眷屬，亦令於此閻浮提中一切國土乃至樹林，分布安置護持養育。
translation: For this reason, I'm going to distribute these four worlds and instruct all of you great celestial kings, all dragon kings, and all of King Kāṭapūtana to each of you to resolve to abandon your retinue and distribute, support, and nurture all of your celestial retinues, even King Kāṭapūtana and all of his retinues, and to distribute, support, and nurture all of the lands and even the forests of Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 是故汝等諸大天王及諸眷屬，乃至迦吒富單那王及諸眷屬，於閻浮提皆應誠心隨喜讚歎，莫瞋莫恨亦莫生怒。」
translation: Therefore, all of you great celestial kings and their retinues, even King Kāṭapūtana and his retinues, should sincerely rejoice and praise them in Jambudvīpa, not holding anger, not hating, and not becoming angry."

source_sentence: 爾時，所有一切菩薩摩訶薩、色界諸天、欲界天人、一切龍眾、一切乾闥婆，乃至一切迦吒富單那等諸來大眾，皆悉合掌各作是言：「我等一切誠心隨喜敬受佛教，如佛世尊分布安置此閻浮提。
translation: At that point, all the bodhisattvas, great gods of the form realm, gods and humans of the desire realm, all the dragons, all the gandharvas, and all the great people of Kāṭapūtana who had come before them all joined their palms and each said, "We all sincerely and joyfully accept Buddhism as the Bhagavān's distribution and placement in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 我等發心受佛教勅護持養育，佛正法眼令得熾然。」
translation: We have resolved to accept the Buddha's commands to protect and nurture us, so that the Buddha's true eye for the Dharma will become blazing."

source_sentence: 佛言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: The Buddha said, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 妙丈夫！
translation: Wonderful husband!

source_sentence: 汝等應當如是誠心說欲隨喜。」
translation: You must thus sincerely explain your desire to please."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告彼法食喜食禪食諸天言：「此四天下大海水中八萬洲渚一切國土，汝等法食喜食禪食諸天，應當護持養育我法，住法比丘如法順法，發心修行三業相應，剃除鬚髮身著袈裟，汝等應當護持養育。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the Dharma-eating, joy-eating, and meditation-eating gods, saying, "You Dharma-eating, joy-eating, and meditation-eating gods of these four continents and 80,000 continents and islets in the ocean's water should protect and nurture our teaching, abide in Dharma monks who conform to the teaching according to the teaching, develop the intention to cultivate the three karmic activities, shave off your hair, and put on the reddish-brown robes, so you should protect and nurture them."

source_sentence: 時，彼法食喜食禪食諸天各作是言：「我當護持大海水中八萬洲渚一切國土諸佛正法。
translation: The Dharma-eating, joy-eating, and meditation-eating gods then each said, "I will safeguard the right Dharma of the Buddhas of all the lands on the 80,000 continents in the ocean's water.

source_sentence: 若佛弟子，乃至不畜婦女、畜生、田宅、資產，我等皆當護持養育。」
translation: If there are any disciples of the Buddha, even those who don't own women, animals, land, or property, we will all protect and nurture them."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚彼天言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised those gods, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 一切大眾亦復讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: All the people also praised him, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告月藏菩薩摩訶薩言：「了知清淨士！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the moon-store bodhisattva Mahāsattva, "You know, pure man!

source_sentence: 若我住世諸聲聞眾，戒具足、捨具足、聞具足、定具足、慧具足、解脫具足、解脫知見具足，我之正法熾然在世，乃至一切諸天人等，亦能顯現平等正法。
translation: If I were to live in a world where śrāvakas had perfect precepts, perfect equanimity, perfect learning, perfect concentration, perfect wisdom, perfect liberation, and perfect knowledge and vision of liberation, my right teaching would be blazing in the world, and all gods and humans would be able to display the right teaching equally.

source_sentence: 於我滅後五百年中，諸比丘等猶於我法解脫堅固；次五百年，我之正法禪定三昧得住堅固；次五百年，讀誦多聞得住堅固；次五百年，於我法中多造塔寺得住堅固；次五百年，於我法中鬪諍言訟白法隱沒損減堅固。
translation: For 500 years after I died, those monks remained resolute in their liberation of my teaching; for the next 500 years, they became resolute in the concentration and samādhi of my right teaching; for the next 500 years, they became resolute in reciting and learning much; for the next 500 years, they became resolute in building many stūpas and temples of my teaching; and for the next 500 years, they became resolute in suppressing and diminishing the white dharma of fighting, speech, and argumentation in my teaching.

source_sentence: 「了知清淨士！
translation: "A man of penetrating knowledge and purity!

source_sentence: 從是以後於我法中，雖復剃除鬚髮身著袈裟，毀破禁戒行不如法假名比丘。
translation: From then on, even though he shaves off his hair and puts on the reddish-brown robes, he breaks the precepts and conducts himself contrary to the Dharma under the pretence of being called a monk.

source_sentence: 如是破戒名字比丘，若有檀越捨施供養護持養育，我說是人猶得無量阿僧祇大福德聚。
translation: If such a monk who breaks the precepts and is called a monk, then if a donor gives alms, makes offerings, and maintains and nurtures him, I'll say that person still obtains a great stock of merit that's incalculable and incalculable.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 猶能饒益多眾生故，何況我今現在於世？
translation: How could I have benefited so many sentient beings, especially now that I'm here in the world?

source_sentence: 「譬如真金為無價寶，若無真金銀為無價，若無銀者鍮石無價，若無鍮石偽寶無價，若無偽寶赤白銅鐵白鑞鉛錫為無價寶。
translation: "It's like true gold is priceless treasure, and if there's no true gold or silver, then thrift is priceless; if there's no silver, then thrift is priceless; if there's no thrift, then counterfeit treasure is priceless; and if there's no counterfeit treasure, then red and white copper, iron, pewter, lead, and tin are priceless treasures.

source_sentence: 如是一切諸世間中佛寶無上，若無佛寶緣覺無上，若無緣覺羅漢無上，若無羅漢諸餘聖眾以為無上，若無聖眾得定凡夫以為無上，若無得定淨持戒者以為無上，若無淨戒污戒比丘以為無上，若無污戒剃除鬚髮身著袈裟名字比丘為無上寶，比餘九十五種異道最尊第一，應受世供為物福田。
translation: Thus, among all the worlds, the buddha treasure is unsurpassed, if there's no buddha treasure the pratyekabuddhas are unsurpassed, if there are no pratyekabuddhas the arhats are unsurpassed, if there are no arhats the rest of the noble sentient beings consider unsurpassed, if there are no noble beings who have attained concentration and are ordinary people consider unsurpassed, if there are no holders of pure precepts who have attained concentration and are upholding precepts consider unsurpassed, if there are no monks with pure precepts who have defiled precepts consider unsurpassed, and if there are no monks with defiled precepts who have shaved their hair and worn robes, the name monk is a supreme treasure that's most honored and superior to the other 95 kinds of heretics and should be accepted as a field of merit for worldly offerings.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 能示眾生可怖畏故。
translation: That's because they can show sentient beings how to be feared.

source_sentence: 若有護持養育安置是人，不久得住忍地。」
translation: If someone guards, nurtures, and places this person, they'll soon attain the stage of patience."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告六欲諸天言：「汝等應如過去佛時所分得分當勤護持，復於此四天下時時之中勤加思惟佛正法義，為令我法得久住故，紹三寶種不斷絕故。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the six heavens of the desire realm, "You should diligently guard them as you did when the Buddha was born, and you should also diligently contemplate the Buddha's correct teaching throughout the four worlds at regular intervals, so that my teaching can be long-lasting and the seeds of the Three Treasures can be introduced and not cut off."

source_sentence: 時彼諸天各作是言：「唯然受教。」
translation: The gods then each said, "Yes, I'll accept your teaching."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised them, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 一切大眾亦復讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: All the people also praised him, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告四天王言：「汝等及諸眷屬，應如過去佛時所分得分，還作護持安置養育我之正法。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the four celestial kings, "You and your retinues should do as you were told in the past when the Buddha was born and return to protect, house, and nurture my right teaching."

source_sentence: 時四天王各作是言：「唯然受教。」
translation: The four heavenly kings then each said, "Yes, I'll accept your teaching."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly all praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告乾闥婆等言：「諸仁者！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān addressed the gandharvas and others, saying, "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 汝等及諸天仙，於優曇林、菴羅林、閻浮林、呵黎勒林、阿摩羅林、蒱萄林，如是等林於中而住，復共四天王宮諸天子等，為我佛法得久住故，應當思惟佛正法義。」
translation: You and the sages of the gods, while staying in the udumbara, āmra, jambu, hariṇa, amala, and sedges forests, and in these forests, should also contemplate the Buddha's correct teaching, together with the sons of the gods in the palace of the four heavenly kings, for the sake of the long abiding of our Buddha's teaching."

source_sentence: 時乾闥婆等咸言：「如是。
translation: The gandharvas and others then said, "So it is.

source_sentence: 大德婆伽婆！
translation: Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 唯然受教。」
translation: I'm sure I'll accept your teaching."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly all praised him, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告娑伽羅龍王、難陀龍王、婆難陀龍王、善現龍王、婆樓那龍王、婆修吉龍王、得叉迦龍王、阿難陀龍王、阿樓那龍王、歲星龍王言：「汝等各在大海之中住本宮殿，護持養育我之正法。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed Dragon-King Sāgara, Dragon-King Nandana, Dragon-King Pāṇḍana, Dragon-King Shanjin, Dragon-King Varuṇa, Dragon-King Bāṣujī, Dragon-King Takṣaka, Dragon-King Ānanda, Dragon-King Āruṇa, and Dragon-King Nyesing, saying, "Each of you stay in your palace in the middle of the ocean and guard and nurture my right teaching."

source_sentence: 時龍王等各作是言：「唯然受教。」
translation: The dragon kings then each said, "Yes, I'll accept your teaching."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告阿那婆達多龍王、善住龍王、清脇龍王、摩利尼龍王、優婆羅龍王、乾闥婆龍王、雲池龍王、主雹龍王、摩奚曼多龍王、美音龍王言：「汝等各住本宮護持養育我之正法。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed Dragon King Anavatapta, Dragon King Shanzhu, Dragon King Qingowo, Dragon King Malini, Dragon King Upālā, Dragon King Qianzhong, Dragon King Yunchi, Dragon King Jixiang, Dragon King Mahīmāntā, and Dragon King Meiyin, saying, "Each of you stay in your own palace and protect and nurture my right teaching."

source_sentence: 時龍王等各作是言：「唯然受教。」
translation: The dragon kings then each said, "Yes, I'll accept your teaching."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告鳩槃茶檀提大將、優婆檀提大將、迦羅迦大將、摩訶鉢賒大將、摩呼陀遮利大將、堀求尼大將、婆朱賒尼大將、鴦崛盧大將、鞞羅差大將、一眉大將言：「汝等各住本宮護持養育我之正法。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the generals Kumbhâṇḍadantī, Upadantī, Kālaka, Mahāprajñā, Mahôdācārya, Kauśānī, Ajñātaśatru, Aṅguloka, Vairocana, and Ikṣvāmitra, saying, "Each of you stay at your home palace and protect and nurture my right teaching."

source_sentence: 時鳩槃茶大將等，各作是言：「唯然受教。」
translation: Then, the generals Kumbhâṇḍa and the others each said, "Yes, I'll accept your teaching."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告因陀夜叉大將、蘇摩大將、婆樓那大將、波闍鉢帝大將、跋羅頭婆闍大將、伊奢那大將、旃檀那大將、月眼大將、婆多竭梨大將、奚摩跋多大將言：「汝等各住本宮護持養育我之正法。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the generals Indra the yakṣa, Sumer, Varuṇa, Pājapati, Bhadrapāja, Īśāna, Candana, Yuehang, Bhadrakapil, and Ximopadar, saying, "Each of you stay at your home palace and protect and nurture my right teaching."

source_sentence: 時夜叉大將等各作是言：「唯然受教。
translation: The great generals of the yakṣas then each said, "Yes, I'll accept your teaching.

source_sentence: 大德婆伽婆！
translation: Venerable Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等護持養育安置世尊正法，及住法比丘供給所須，乃至剃髮不持戒者，亦復供給一切所須。
translation: We guard, nurture, and place the Bhagavān's right teaching and the monks who abide in the teaching to provide for what's needed, even those who shave their hair and don't observe the precepts, and we also provide for all that's needed.

source_sentence: 為令佛法得久住故，紹三寶種不斷絕故，三種精氣得增長故，休息一切鬪諍、言訟、怨讐、疫病、飢饉短乏、非時亢旱、曜宿失度為斷除故，乃至世尊聲聞弟子三業相應不積聚者，當勤養育。」
translation: Because it's possible for the Buddha's teaching to be long-lasting, for the seeds of the three treasures to be introduced and not be cut off, for the three kinds of energy to grow, and for all quarrels, arguments, feuds, epidemics, famine, shortages, unseasonable droughts, and lapses in concentration to be stopped, even śrāvaka disciples of the Bhagavān who don't accumulate the three karmic attachments will be diligently nourished."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised them, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝等如是為利益安樂一切三界眾生故。」
translation: You do this for the benefit and welfare of all sentient beings in the three realms."

source_sentence: 及一切大眾，亦復讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: And all the people also praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告一切畢利多依曠野住者、一切毘舍遮依空舍住者、一切富單那依野田住者、一切迦吒富單那依於塜間及廁邊住者言：「汝等各於住處護持養育我之正法。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed all the Pṛthivīs who lived in the wilderness, all the Vaiśācīs who lived in empty houses, all the Pūtanas who lived in the wilderness, and all the Kāṭapūtanas who lived in the graveyard and by the toilet, saying, "At each of your dwelling places, safeguard and nurture my right teaching."

source_sentence: 時畢利多等各作是言：「唯然受教。」
translation: Pṛthivī and the others then each said, "Yes, I'll accept your teaching."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the crowd all praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復作是言：「諸仁者！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān again said, "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 所有諸天、乾闥婆、緊那羅、夜叉、羅剎、龍王、阿修羅、鳩槃茶，如昔世尊所分得分國土城邑聚落舍宅，隨所得處為作護持安置養育，我當隨喜，一切大眾亦復隨喜。
translation: "All the gods, goddesses, kiṃnaras, yakṣas, rāṣas, dragon kings, asuras, and kumbhāṇḍas who were assigned lands, cities, towns, villages, and mansions by the Bhagavān in the past and who were defended, placed, and nurtured wherever they could be, I would be delighted, and so would all the people.

source_sentence: 若復有諸天、龍、夜叉乃至迦吒富單那等，如昔世尊所分得分國土城邑，不正護持安置養育者，我當轉付諸餘天龍，令其安置護持養育，各隨國土善作護持。
translation: If there are gods, dragons, yakṣas, or even Kāṭapūtanas who have incorrectly defended, placed, and nurtured their lands and cities just like the Bhagavān's share of them, I will convey them to the other gods and dragons to place, defend, and nurture them, each according to their lands, and to skillfully defend them.

source_sentence: 「我今以波羅奈國付囑善髮乾闥婆千眷屬，阿尼羅夜叉仙五百眷屬，須質多羅阿修羅無量眷屬，德叉迦龍王百眷屬，大黑天女五百眷屬，汝等護持養育波羅奈國，為令我法得久住故，紹三寶種不斷絕故，遮障一切惡眾生故。」
translation: "Now, I've entrusted the country of Polonai to a thousand retinues of the good-haired gandharvas, 500 retinues of the sage Anila the yakṣa, measureless retinues of the asuras of Sugatara, 100 retinues of the dragon king Takṣaka, and 500 retinues of the great black goddesses, so that you will protect and nourish Polonai for the sake of making my teaching long-lasting, preserving the seeds of the Three Treasures without ceasing, and obstructing all evil sentient beings."

source_sentence: 時善髮乾闥婆、阿尼羅夜叉仙、須質多羅阿修羅、德叉迦龍王、大黑天女等，各與眷屬咸作是言：「大德婆伽婆！
translation: The good-haired gandharva, the sage Aniruddha, the asura Sugatara, the dragon king Takṣaka, and the great black goddess each said this with their retinues, "Vṛji Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等護持養育安置波羅奈國周遍土境，遮障不饒益、養育饒益者，乃至遮障一切不善諸惡眾生。」
translation: We guard and nurture the territory that surrounds the country of Vārāṇasī, blocking those who don't benefit and nurture those who do benefit, even to the point of blocking all unwholesome and evil sentient beings."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 諸來大眾亦復讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The crowd also praised him, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以迦毘羅婆國付囑火護緊那羅仙千眷屬、拘翅羅聲乾闥婆萬眷屬、婆闥跋帝夜叉大將千眷屬、奢摩那遲阿修羅二萬眷屬、跋那牟支龍王一萬眷屬、摩訶鉢奢鳩槃茶大將五百眷屬、栴遲栴茶梨二大天女各一萬眷屬：「汝等共護迦毘羅婆國，乃至遮障諸惡眾生。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Kapilavastu to a thousand retinues of the fire guard god Kisnaurā, ten thousand retinues of the gandharva Kauśinagara, a thousand retinues of the great general Vāmaṇeras, twenty thousand retinues of the asuras Vāmaṇerī, ten thousand retinues of the dragon king Vāmaucī, five hundred retinues of the great general Mahāprajñapāṇḍa, and ten thousand retinues of each of the two great goddesses Caṇḍi and Caṇḍi-Caṇḍi: "Protect the country of Kapilavastu together, even to the point of obstructing unwholesome sentient beings."

source_sentence: 彼等一切皆作是言：「我等及諸眷屬，護持養育迦毘羅婆國周遍土境，乃至遮障諸惡眾生。」
translation: All of them said, "We and our retinues will protect and nourish the land of Kapilavastu and its environs, even as we obstruct harmful sentient beings."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole group praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以摩伽陀國付囑善住炎光天子千眷屬、優波羅乾闥婆千眷屬、樂聲阿修羅千眷屬、善臂龍王善意龍王各萬眷屬、孔雀味阿修羅五百眷屬、拘那羅大夜叉三千眷屬、軍毘羅夜叉百千眷屬、十象鳩槃茶大將百千眷屬、懆惡天女奪意天女各十千眷屬：「汝等共護摩伽陀國，乃至遮障諸惡眾生。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Magadha with the following mandate: "You must protect the country of Magadha together, even to the extent of blocking harmful sentient beings."

source_sentence: 佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以拘薩羅國付囑迷提羯那天子千眷屬、樂勝乾闥婆大將十千眷屬、烏麻緊那羅千眷屬、具德龍王千眷屬、弗沙鉢帝阿修羅五百眷屬、婆樓那夜叉大將婆樓那王夜叉大將各五萬眷屬、那荼迦鳩槃荼五百眷屬、摩尼毘梨天女千眷屬：「汝等共護拘薩羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of Kośala to a thousand retinues of the god Maitreya, ten thousand retinues of the great general Rājagṛha, a thousand retinues of the udumbara kiṃnara, a thousand retinues of the Gautama-nāga-rāja, five hundred retinues of the asuras Pauṣṭhila, fifty thousand retinues each of the great general Varuṇa, five hundred retinues of the king Varuṇa, five hundred retinues of the god Nādaka-kumbhâṇḍa, and a thousand retinues of the goddess Maṇibiri, saying, "All of you, protect Kośala together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以鴦伽國付囑月音天子萬眷屬、樂欲乾闥婆大將霑浮樓乾闥婆大將各十千眷屬、阿摩羅軍緊那羅五百眷屬、師子藏阿修羅五百眷屬、旃檀大夜叉力幢大夜叉各五千眷屬、奴羅車鳩槃荼二千五百眷屬、摩訶迦梨天女二千五百眷屬：「汝等共護鴦伽國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed Aṅga to entrust the ten thousand followers of the ten thousand followers of the god Yueyin, the ten thousand followers of the great general of the Gangs of Lakṣmī, the ten thousand followers of the great general of the Gangs of Pulau, the five hundred followers of the amala army of the kiṃnara, the five hundred followers of the lion's store of asuras, the five thousand followers of the great nightshade of Chandaka, the great nightshade of Nurācana, the two thousand five hundred followers of the goddess Mahākāla, and the two thousand five hundred followers of the goddess Mahākāla: "All of you, protect the land of Aṅga together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以般遮羅國付囑羅拏時天子五百眷屬、樂歌乾闥婆七百眷屬、摩葉緊那羅千眷屬、般支迦夜叉將五千眷屬、安闍瞿波阿修羅千眷屬、樂法鳩槃茶五百眷屬、左黑天女王鬘天女各二千五百眷屬：「汝等共護般遮羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed Rāṇasena to entrust 500 members of his retinue, 700 members of the retinue of Rājagṛha, 700 members of the retinue of Mahêśvara, 1,000 members of the retinue of Mahêśvara, 5,000 members of the retinue of Pancakra, 1,000 members of the retinue of Anjagupta, 500 members of the retinue of Rājagupta, 500 members of the retinue of Rājagupta, and 2,500 members of the retinue of Queen Zoroaster and Queen Mālādhāra: "All of you, protect the country of Pancakra together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以蘇摩國付囑寶髻天子五千眷屬、摩頭曼多乾闥婆千眷屬、勝縷緊那羅千眷屬、優波般遮迦夜叉將二千眷屬、黑龍王千眷屬、知欲阿修羅千眷屬、鳩羅婆鳩槃茶六百眷屬、斯多天女博叉天女各五百眷屬：「汝等共護蘇摩國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the land of Sumer with 5,000 retinues of the Bauble-Topknot Heavenly Son, 1,000 retinues of the Madhumanta Gandharvas, 1,000 retinues of the Vetāla Kiṃnara, 2,000 retinues of the Upapanthaka Yakṣas, 1,000 retinues of the Black Dragon King, 1,000 retinues of the Desire-Knowing Asuras, 600 retinues of the Kumbhâṇḍa Kumbhâṇḍa, and 500 retinues of each of the Sthavira and Bokhasattva goddesses, saying, "All of you, protect the land of Sumer together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以阿濕婆國付囑盧醯奴天子千二百眷屬、流水乾闥婆千眷屬、摩尼拓羅夜叉軍將五千眷屬、阿周羅阿修羅六百眷屬、日光龍王無量眷屬、摩尼拓利鳩槃茶五百眷屬、不可取天女馬勝天女各二千五百眷屬：「汝等共護阿濕婆國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of Aśva to 1,200 members of the retinue of Rohinu, 1,000 members of the retinue of Rājagṛha, 5,000 members of the retinue of Maṇḍala, 5,000 members of the retinue of Manitra, 600 members of Asura, an unlimited number of members of Sunlight Dragon King, 500 members of Maṇḍala, 500 members of the retinue of Maṇḍala, and 2,500 members of each of the goddesses of Unseen and Mañjuśrī, "Protect the kingdom of Aśva together, all of you!"

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以摩偷羅國付囑善擇天子十千眷屬、靜明乾闥婆千眷屬、遊梯迦緊那羅二百眷屬、勝欲夜叉乘人大夜叉各千五百眷屬、無垢龍王千眷屬、伽楞拓利阿修羅千眷屬、墨色鳩槃茶千眷屬、奪意天女二千眷屬：「汝等共護摩偷羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of Mathilā to ten thousand retinues of the goddess of skillful selection, a thousand retinues of the silent gandharvas, 200 retinues of the Yautika kiṃnaras, a thousand and a half retinues of each of the great yakṣas of the Vaiśravaṇa vehicle, a thousand retinues of the Vimalakīrti dragon king, a thousand retinues of the Kālentārikā asuras, a thousand retinues of the Mañjuśrī kumbhāṇḍa, and two thousand retinues of the mind-snatching goddesses, saying, "All of you, protect the kingdom of Mathilā together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以支提耶國付囑善賢天子五百眷屬、阿吒迦乾闥婆五百眷屬、無垢緊那羅千眷屬、除結夜叉無結夜叉各五百眷屬、妙賢龍千眷屬、普竹阿修羅五百眷屬、牛王鳩槃茶三百眷屬、勝優波羅天女千眷屬：「汝等共護支提耶國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed 500 members of the retinue of the good sons of gods, 500 members of the retinue of the gandharvas of Āṭaka, 1,000 members of the retinue of the stainless kiṃnara, 500 members of each of the yakṣas and yakṣas without bonds, 1,000 members of the dragons of Marvelous Goodness, 500 members of the asuras of Pūrva-Videha, 300 members of the retinue of the cow king Kumbhâṇḍa, and 1,000 members of the goddess Suprabhāra, "All of you, protect the country of Śrīditya together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以婆蹉國付囑月光天子十千眷屬、蓮華香乾闥婆千眷屬、摩陀那果緊那羅五千眷屬、大果夜叉五千眷屬、阿樓那龍千眷屬、惡樹阿修羅百眷屬、葉眼鳩槃茶五百眷屬、阿那迦華天女千眷屬：「汝等共護婆蹉國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the ten thousand followers of the Candraprabha goddess, a thousand followers of the lotus-scented gandharvas, five thousand followers of the madana fruit kiṃnara, five thousand followers of the great fruit yakṣas, a thousand followers of the aruṇa dragons, a hundred followers of the evil tree asuras, five hundred followers of the leaf-eyed kumbhâṇḍas, and a thousand followers of the anākāśa goddesses to "Work together to protect the land of Vātsī."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以賒耶國付囑摩醯首羅天仙五千眷屬、不酒乾闥婆千眷屬、離垢緊那羅千眷屬、因陀羅夜叉蘇摩夜叉各二千五百眷屬、善現龍千眷屬、牟真隣陀阿修羅王五百眷屬、優波檀提鳩槃茶訖利迦賒鳩槃茶各二千五百眷屬、鬼子母天女善護天女各萬眷屬：「汝等共護賒耶國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed Mahêśvara to entrust 5,000 members of his retinue, 1,000 members of his retinue in the Qianzhong family, 1,000 members of his retinue in the Revata Kiṃnara family, 2,500 members of each of Indra's yakṣas and Sumer's yakṣas, 1,000 members of the dragons who well manifest, 500 members of King Mucilinda's retinue asuras, 2,500 members of each of Upatandi Kumbhâṇḍa, Kṛkâṇḍa Kumbhâṇḍa, and 10,000 members of each of the goddesses Mṛgāra and Mahêśvara: "All of you, protect the land of Śākyamuni together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以優禪尼國付囑月雲天子五百眷屬、門牟乾闥婆千眷屬、摩尼耳乾闥婆五百眷屬、五惡夜叉千眷屬、山臂龍王五百眷屬、木手阿修羅三百眷屬、善現鳩槃茶五百眷屬、毛齒天女千眷屬：「汝等共護優禪尼國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the five hundred followers of the moon-clouded god child, a thousand followers of the gandharva Māmu, five hundred followers of the maṇḍala gandharva, a thousand followers of the five evil yakṣas, five hundred followers of the mountain-armed dragon king, three hundred followers of the wood-handed asura, five hundred followers of the well-appearing kumbhāṇḍa, and a thousand followers of the hairy-toothed goddess to guard the Udyāna country together.

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以修羅吒國付囑法華天子百千眷屬、具欲乾闥婆將萬眷屬、山怖緊那羅仙一百眷屬、難陀龍王十千眷屬、驢眼阿修羅五百眷屬、善燈大夜叉千眷屬、大肚鳩槃茶將千眷屬、安隱天女千眷屬：「汝等共護修羅吒國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the hundred thousand followers of the Lotus Sutra, ten thousand followers of the desire-granting Qianzhong, one hundred followers of the mountain fear kiṃnara sage, ten thousand followers of the Nandana dragon king, five hundred followers of the donkey-eyed asura, one thousand followers of the well-lighted great yakṣas, one thousand followers of the great belly kumbhâṇḍa general, and one thousand followers of the Aniruddha goddess, "All of you, protect the country of Śūraṭa together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以摩訶羅仛(丑加反)國付囑孔雀髮天子五百眷屬、樂欲乾闥婆虎就乾闥婆各五百眷屬、乳味緊那羅百眷屬、主水龍王千眷屬、樂寶阿修羅五百眷屬、羖羝脚大夜叉軍那羅大夜叉各千眷屬、鉢頭摩迦鳩槃茶大將五百眷屬、婆樓尼大天女五千眷屬：「汝等共護摩訶羅仛國。」
translation: The Bhagavān then instructed the five hundred followers of the Peacock-haired Sage, five hundred followers of the Lustful Gandharva and the Tigers, one hundred followers of the Milk Taste Kinnara, one thousand followers of the Water Dragon King, five hundred followers of the Lakṣmī Asura, one thousand followers of each of the great bunched yakṣas and great yakṣas of Nārā, five hundred followers of the great general Prātimokṣa Kumbhāṇḍa, and five thousand followers of the great god Bhāluṇī, "All of you protect the land of Mahārāma."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以輸盧那國付囑千金天子千眷屬、善脇乾闥婆千眷屬、白色緊那羅五百眷屬、世辯夜叉千眷屬、大富鳩槃茶五百眷屬、極惡天女摩尼果天女各五百眷屬：「汝等共護輸盧那國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of śloka to a thousand retinues of the thousand gold celestials, a thousand retinues of the well-bellied gandharvas, five hundred retinues of the white kiṃnara, a thousand retinues of the world-advocate yakṣas, five hundred retinues of the great wealthy kumbhāṇḍa, and five hundred retinues each of the extremely wicked goddesses and maṇi-good goddesses, saying, "All of you, protect the kingdom of śloka together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以摩尼讇鞞國付囑華音天子五百眷屬、那羅延乾闥婆二百眷屬、摩醯首羅華緊那羅三百眷屬、團眼夜叉五百眷屬、波羅奈子阿修羅百眷屬、赤目鳩槃茶百眷屬、雪王天女百眷屬：「汝等共護摩尼讇(市瞻反)鞞國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the five hundred followers of the god Huayin, two hundred followers of the Nārāyaṇa and Kālāmaṇerī, three hundred followers of the Mahêśvara and Kisnaṇa, five hundred followers of the Virūḍhaka, one hundred followers of the Paranirmita-vaśubha, one hundred followers of the Red-eyed Kumbhâṇḍa, and one hundred followers of the Snow King's celestial maids, "All of you, protect the country of Maṇḍhaka together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以波吒羅弗國付囑娑羅流支天子千眷屬、人華乾闥婆五百眷屬、摩尼瞿沙緊那羅三百眷屬、聲佉流支夜叉五百眷屬、娑羅地阿修羅五百眷屬、尸利瞿沙龍八百眷屬、浮流尼鳩槃茶百眷屬、毘樓池天女五百眷屬：「汝等共護波吒羅弗國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the thousand followers of the god Sālêśvara, 500 followers of the human-flowered Gandharvas, 300 followers of the Maṇi Ghoṣa Kiṃnaras, 500 followers of the Sālêśvara yakṣas, 500 followers of the Sālêśvara asuras, 800 followers of the Śrīgosaurus, 100 followers of the Pulauṇi Kumbhâṇḍas, and 500 followers of the Virūḍhaka goddesses to "Protect the land of Śālêśvara together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: (次鴦伽國下)爾時，世尊以乾陀羅國付囑火布天子三千眷屬、喜歌乾闥婆千眷屬、大勝緊那羅五百眷屬、師子髮夜叉五百眷屬、伊羅鉢龍王千眷屬、賢力龍王千眷屬、精氣主阿修羅五百眷屬、猨猴聲鳩槃茶百眷屬、摩尼天女頻頭天女各千眷屬：「汝等共護乾陀羅國。」
translation: (Next, Aṅga country) It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the goddess of fire to entrust the country of Gandhāra with 3,000 retinues of the goddess of fire, 1,000 retinues of the gandharva of joy, 500 retinues of the great victorious kiṃnara, 500 retinues of the lion-haired yakṣa, 1,000 retinues of the dragon king of Airāvaṇa, 1,000 retinues of the dragon king of wisdom, 500 retinues of the asura, 500 retinues of the lord of energy, 100 retinues of the monkey-sounding kumbhāṇḍa, and 1,000 retinues of each of the maṇi goddesses and the goddesses of the vulture: "All of you, protect the country of Gandhāra together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以阿槃提國付囑師子愛天子五千眷屬、摩羅曼多乾闥婆二千眷屬、勝目緊那羅百眷屬、蘇摩夜叉地行夜叉各千眷屬、氷加羅阿修羅三千眷屬、婆私陀荼龍千眷屬、軍那羅叉鳩槃茶百眷屬、憂波羅天女流泉天女各二千眷屬：「汝等共護阿槃提國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the state of Avanti to 5,000 members of the lion-love gods, 2,000 members of the Mālamānta gandharvas, 100 members of the Vaiśravaṇa Kiṃnara, 1,000 members each of the Sumeru yakṣas and Tiṅgā yakṣas, 3,000 members of the Bingara asuras, 1,000 members of the Vātsīputrīya dragons, 100 members of the Kunarakṣa Kumbhâṇḍa, and 2,000 members each of the Upāli goddesses and the Nirmāṇarati goddesses, saying, "All of you, protect the state of Avanti together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以婆樓挐跋帝國付囑雞娑利天子千眷屬、眾綵乾闥婆五百眷屬、博叉流支緊那羅二百眷屬、迦茶龍王憂波迦荼龍王各二千眷屬、毘摩阿修羅百眷屬、月焱鳩槃茶三百眷屬、自護天女摩尼頻頭天女各千眷屬：「汝等共護婆樓挐跋帝國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of Bhāluvatī to a thousand retinues of the god Kāśālī, 500 retinues of the various garbhadhas, 200 retinues of the Pāṭaliputra kiṃnara, 2,000 retinues each of the Kātyāyana dragon king Upakāṇḍa dragon king, 100 retinues of the Vimala asura, 300 retinues of the Yueyan kumbhāṇḍa, and a thousand retinues each of the Śivi goddess Maniputra: "All of you, protect the kingdom of Bhāluvatī together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以帝跋尼國付囑師子齒天子五千眷屬、薩陀曼多乾闥婆五百眷屬、牟尼薩羅緊那羅百眷屬、摩尼賢夜叉滿賢夜叉各二千五百眷屬、鐵耳阿修羅五百眷屬、阿槃多鳩槃茶百眷屬、薩市尼天女般支天女各千眷屬：「汝等共護帝跋尼國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of Devānā to 5,000 members of the lion-dog goddess's retinue, 500 members of Saddharmântaka's retinue, 100 members of Munisara's retinue, 2,500 members of each of the Maṇiśrī Yakṣas and Pūrṇaśrī Yakṣas, 500 members of the Tiṣya asuras, 100 members of Avanti's retinue, and 1,000 members of each of the Saśini goddesses and Pārṇaśrī's retinue, saying, "All of you, protect the kingdom of Devānā together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以瞻波國付囑香雲天子并諸天仙一千眷屬、德鬘乾闥婆二百眷屬、求籌遮緊那羅百眷屬、堅毛夜叉五千眷屬、迦那迦阿修羅百眷屬、善現鳩槃茶近現鳩槃茶各五萬眷屬、什目天女五百眷屬：「汝等共護瞻波國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the goddess Fragrant Cloud and the sages to entrust 1,000 members of their retinue, 200 members of the retinue of the gandharva, 100 members of the retinue of the kuṇḍacara, 5,000 members of the hard-haired yakṣas, 100 members of the kanaka asuras, 50,000 members of the retinue of the well-appearing kumbhāṇḍacara and the near-appearing kumbhāṇḍacara, and 500 members of the shimukhā goddesses, "All of you, protect the country of Campā together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以悉都那國付囑赤雲天子千眷屬、霑浮樓乾闥婆五百眷屬、摩尼遮婆緊那羅百眷屬、難勝夜叉千眷屬、泥荼鳩支阿修羅五百眷屬、鞞[少/兔]迦鳩槃茶百眷屬、靜默天女善目天女各一千五百眷屬：「汝等共護悉都那國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of Siddhârtha to a thousand retinues of the red cloud gods, five hundred retinues of the god Jambudvīpa, a hundred retinues of the Mañjuśrī Kiṃnara, a thousand retinues of the unsurpassed yakṣas, five hundred retinues of the nyaya-kukkuṭa asuras, a hundred retinues of the vaiḍūka-kumbhāṇḍa, and one thousand five hundred retinues each of the silent goddesses and the good-looking goddesses, saying, "All of you, protect the kingdom of Siddhârtha together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以西地國付囑山眼天子二百眷屬、法喜乾闥婆百眷屬、藪支羅婆緊那羅百眷屬、大身夜叉千眷屬、執刀阿修羅百眷屬、止流鳩槃茶三百眷屬、金光天女黑光天女各二千五百眷屬：「汝等共護西地國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed 200 retinues of the Mountain-Eyed Prince, 100 retinues of the Dharma-joyful Gangs, 100 retinues of the Śubha Kiṃnara, 1,000 retinues of the Great-Body Scythe, 100 retinues of the Knife-Wielding Asuras, 300 retinues of the Still-Liu Kumbhâṇḍa, and 2,500 retinues of each of the Golden-Gloss Divas and Black-Gloss Divas, "All of you, protect the Western Land together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以富樓沙富羅國付囑阿羅脯斯天子千眷屬、難提乾闥婆百眷屬、淨眾緊那羅百眷屬、摩尼華夜叉千眷屬、迦荼龍王阿婆羅羅龍王各二千五百眷屬、大怖伽樓羅百眷屬、訖多孫地阿修羅五百眷屬、燒竹鳩槃茶五百眷屬、多盧斯天女三目天女各五百眷屬：「汝等共護富樓沙富羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān charged the kingdom of Pūrśapura with entrusting 1,000 members of the retinue of the god Ārāpanna, 100 members of the retinue of the Nandika gandharva, 100 members of the retinue of the Kunaras, 1,000 members of the Maṇiya yakṣas, 2,500 members of the retinue of each of the Kāṇḍa dragons and the Ābhāra dragons, 100 members of the retinue of the Mahātejas garuḍa, 500 members of the retinue of the Ketasundī asura, 500 members of the retinue of the Ketuṣpancha, and 500 members of the retinue of each of the three eyed goddesses of the Dolus: "All of you, protect the kingdom of Pūrśapura together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以烏場國土付囑習音天子五百眷屬、華光乾闥婆三百眷屬、善怖緊那羅百眷屬、迦羅婆提夜叉五百眷屬、郎浮羅龍三百眷屬、遮曼池阿修羅百眷屬、曼陀果鳩槃荼百眷屬、呵梨帝天女染賢天女各五百眷屬：「汝等共護烏場國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted 500 retinues of the god Xianyin, 300 retinues of the flamboyant gandharva, 100 retinues of the fearful kiṃnara, 500 retinues of the karabatic yakṣas, 300 retinues of the dragons of Langfra, 100 retinues of the asuras of Cāmāncī, 100 retinues of the mandrake kumbhāṇḍa, and 500 retinues of the goddess Hāritī and the goddess Renunciant, "All of you, protect the land of Wuchang together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以寄薩離國付囑黑色天子千眷屬、金色乾闥婆百眷屬、跋那牟至緊那羅八十眷屬、散髮夜叉五百眷屬、力天龍王百眷屬、那佉遮利阿修羅百眷屬、無垢聲鳩槃茶八十眷屬、勝鍼天女蠍天女各五百眷屬：「汝等共護寄薩離國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the kingdom of Aśālī to a thousand retinues of the black celestials, a hundred retinues of the golden gandharvas, eighty retinues of the Vāmaucilinda kiṃnara, five hundred retinues of the scatter-haired yakṣas, a hundred retinues of the powerful celestial dragon kings, a hundred retinues of the nākācārya asuras, eighty retinues of the soundless kumbhāṇḍas, and five hundred retinues each of the victorious Maitreya goddesses and scorpion goddesses, saying, "All of you, protect the kingdom of Aśālī together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以金性國付囑禪那離沙婆天子五百眷屬、摩那婆乾闥婆百眷屬、善稱緊那羅百眷屬、禪那離沙婆夜叉五百眷屬、寶冠阿修羅百眷屬、香意鳩槃茶八十眷屬：「汝等共護金性國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the five hundred followers of the celestial son Zenarśva, the hundred followers of the manabha gods, the hundred followers of the well-proclaimed kiṃnara, the five hundred followers of the Zenarśva yakṣas, the hundred followers of the jeweled crowned asuras, and the eighty followers of the fragrant-eyed kumbhāṇḍas with the promise of the golden nature of the land: "All of you, protect the golden nature of the land together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以摩都羅國付囑歌讚天子百眷屬、五髻乾闥婆五百眷屬、威德緊那羅八十眷屬、堅鉾夜叉五百眷屬、氷伽羅阿修羅五百眷屬、賢目鳩槃茶百眷屬、霑浮樓天女五百眷屬：「汝等共護摩都羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the 100 followers of Goshen, 500 followers of the five topknotted gandharvas, 80 followers of the dignified kiṃnara, 500 followers of the kamaboko yakṣas, 500 followers of the igara asuras, 100 followers of the wise eyed kumbhâṇḍas, and 500 followers of the goddess James Pulau, "All of you protect the land of Mathurā together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以藪離迦國付囑財目天子千眷屬、善頂乾闥婆百眷屬、賒摩鳩斯緊那羅五百眷屬、堅固夜叉五百眷屬、耶婆那夜叉千眷屬、無畏緊那羅百眷屬、跋羅頭婆闍夜叉五百眷屬、嚪婆何利阿修羅八百眷屬、瞿伽叉鳩槃茶三百眷屬、嚪婆何利羅剎五百眷屬、釋迦羅剎五百眷屬：「汝等共護藪離迦國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Sūryaka to a thousand followers of the god Wealthy Eyes, a hundred followers of the well-appointed Gandharvas, five hundred followers of the Śamakus Kinnara, five hundred followers of the Resolute Yakṣas, a thousand followers of the Yavana Yakṣas, a hundred followers of the Fearless Kinnara, five hundred followers of the Bhārādrapāja Yakṣas, eight hundred followers of the Asuras of Thāvāhana, three hundred followers of the Gogakṣas Kumbhâṇḍa, five hundred followers of the Rāṣas of Thāvāhana, and five hundred followers of the Rāṣas of Śākya, "All of you, protect the country of Sūryaka together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以般遮囊伽羅國付囑婆婆叉天子千眷屬、月光乾闥婆百眷屬、圍目夜叉千眷屬、大雲阿修羅五百眷屬、訶奴闍鳩槃茶百眷屬、摩尼枳薩梨天女五百眷屬、多摩羅婆利天女千眷屬：「汝等共護般遮囊伽羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the sons of Pāṭaliputra to entrust a thousand members of their retinue, a hundred members of the Candradeva family, a thousand members of the Virūḍhaka family, five hundred members of the Mahāmucilinda asuras, a hundred members of the Hanuchakubanja family, five hundred members of the Maṇi Kesari family, and a thousand members of the Tamālapālai family, "Work together to protect the land of Pāṭaliputra."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以波斯國付囑檀[少/兔]師天子五千眷屬、拘毘羅乾闥婆三千眷屬、梨鞞摩師緊那羅千眷屬、住勇夜叉五百眷屬、那摩羅王夜叉五百眷屬、菴羅提他乾闥婆千眷屬、伊沙那時緊那羅千眷屬、竭娑拘支鳩槃茶四千眷屬、那羅斯羅剎五千眷屬、呵梨達羅剎二千眷屬：「汝等共護波斯國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān charged the goddess Dānavat, 5,000 members of his retinue, 3,000 members of the Kubila gandharvas, 1,000 members of the Revatī kiṃnara retinue, 500 members of the Sumeru yakṣas, 500 members of the Nāmāra yakṣas, 1,000 members of the Amṛtitā gandharvas, 1,000 members of the Isanāthi kiṃnara retinue, 4,000 members of the Kauśikubanja retinue, 5,000 members of the Nāroṣa rāsas, and 2,000 members of the Hāritarāṣa retinue, "All of you protect the land of Persia together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以勅勤國土付囑佉樓那天子千眷屬、妙好乾闥婆五百眷屬、帝利迦緊那羅五百眷屬、三鉢夜叉二萬眷屬、怖畏夜叉十千眷屬、休流歇龍千眷屬、金耳阿修羅千眷屬、善林樹鳩槃茶千眷屬、金枳(金支反)薩羅羅剎五千眷屬：「汝等共護勅勤國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted Imaqin's land to a thousand retinues of the god Kālôdayin, five hundred retinues of the wonderfully beautiful Gandharvas, five hundred retinues of the Tilika Kiṃnaras, twenty thousand retinues of the three bowl yakṣas, ten thousand retinues of the fearful yakṣas, a thousand retinues of the dragons of Huruśa, a thousand retinues of the golden-eared asuras, a thousand retinues of the good forest tree Kumbhâṇḍa, and five thousand retinues of the golden hedge rāṣṭrapāla: "Protect Imaqin's land together, all of you!"

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以叵耶那國付囑海怖天子千眷屬、那茶浮乾闥婆百眷屬、馬目緊那羅百眷屬、華齒夜叉二千眷屬、大齒夜叉千眷屬、憂波羅耳龍五百眷屬、動手阿修羅百眷屬、解脫鳩槃茶百眷屬、質摩只薩梨羅剎女五百眷屬、黑闇羅剎護門羅剎各二千五百眷屬、月光羅剎千眷屬：「汝等共護叵耶那國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the goddess Ujjayinī to entrust a thousand members of his retinue, a hundred members of the Nātapuṇḍa family, a hundred members of the Māmakīnara family, two thousand members of the Flower-Toothed Yakṣa, a thousand members of the Great-Toothed Yakṣa, five hundred members of the Upālaka, a hundred members of the Handsome Asuras, a hundred members of the Liberated Kumbhâṇḍa family, five hundred members of the Cemetery Rāṣṭrapāla women, two thousand five hundred members of each of the Dark Rāṣṭas and the Gate Guard Rāṣṭas, and a thousand members of the Moonlight Rāṣṭas, "Work together to protect the country of Ujjayinī."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時世尊以尸利耶摩國付囑黑髮天子百眷屬、金臂乾闥婆八十眷屬、風響緊那羅百眷屬、阿樓那夜叉千眷屬、八髮夜叉千眷屬、上踊龍王百眷屬、快作阿修羅百眷屬、香筒鳩槃荼五百眷屬、黑澤天女五百眷屬：「汝等共護尸利耶摩國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the hundred followers of the black-haired god Śrīyaṇa, the eighty followers of the golden-armed gandharva, the hundred followers of the wind-sounding kiṃnara, the thousand followers of the aruṇa yakṣa, the thousand followers of the eight-haired yakṣa, the hundred followers of the ascending dragon king, the hundred followers of the fastidious asura, the five hundred followers of the fragrant kumbhāṇḍa, and the five hundred followers of the black-zebra goddess, "All of you, protect the country of Śrīyaṇa together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以跋離迦國付囑赤銅色天子八百眷屬、媚眼乾闥婆百眷屬、鍼黑緊那羅百眷屬、牟耳夜叉五千眷屬、黟羅羯那龍百眷屬、息牛阿修羅百眷屬、阿毘拏薩利鳩槃茶五百眷屬、長苗天女妙勝天女各五百眷屬：「汝等共護跋離迦國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the 800 followers of the red-bronze god Tso, the 100 followers of the eye-pleasing Gandharvas, the 100 followers of the MST black kiṃnara, the 5,000 followers of the monks and yakṣas, the 100 followers of the Yilakana dragons, the 100 followers of the calf asuras, the 500 followers of the Abhiṇḍalikūpaṇḍa, and the 500 followers of each of the Nāgasena goddesses and the Mañjuśrī goddesses, "All of you protect the country of Bhallika together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以罽賓那國付囑怖黑天子五十眷屬、五音乾闥婆千眷屬、水性緊那羅五百眷屬、廣執夜叉三萬眷屬、長生夜叉流雲解脫夜叉各二千五百眷屬、睺羅荼龍十千眷屬、欝金阿修羅千眷屬、陀樓跋尼鳩槃茶五百眷屬、正辯天女千眷屬、園林羅剎女十千眷屬：「汝等共護罽賓那國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Kapphiṇa with 50 retinues of the Tārāditya, 1,000 retinues of the five-voice gandharvas, 500 retinues of the watery kiṃnara, 30,000 retinues of the vast-held yakṣas, 2,500 retinues each of the long-living yakṣas and the cloud-liberating yakṣas, 10,000 retinues of the hoodoos, 1,000 retinues of the ursine asuras, 500 retinues of the dravyaṇī kumbhāṇḍa, 1,000 retinues of the correct-advocacy goddesses, and 10,000 retinues of the garden-rāṣasas, saying, "Work together to protect Kapphiṇa."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以憂羅賒國付囑那羅摩乾闥婆百眷屬、五怖夜叉二千眷屬、尸利沙夜叉千眷屬：「汝等共護憂羅賒國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the 100 members of the Nāgârjuna clan, 2,000 members of the five fearful yakṣas, and 1,000 members of the Śirīṣa yakṣa clan to protect the country of Śrāvastī together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以佉羅婆羅國付囑時蘭那乾闥婆百眷屬、華寶夜叉千眷屬、善樂目龍千眷屬、怖人鳩槃茶五百眷屬、順欲天女百眷屬；「汝等共護佉羅婆羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Kharabhara to a hundred members of the family of the Lanna Gandharvas, a thousand members of the Flower Treasures yakṣas, a thousand members of the Sunjoy Eyes dragons, five hundred members of the Terrible People Kumbhâṇḍa, and a hundred members of the Goddess of the Desire realm, saying, "All of you, protect the country of Kharabhara together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以阿疎居迦國付囑牟尼佉利夜叉二千眷屬、好施羅剎千眷屬、婆稚龍五百眷屬、止雲鳩槃荼百眷屬、呵梨帝羅剎女千眷屬：「汝等共護阿疎居迦國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed Muni Khari and the Thousand members of the Rāṣṭrapāla retinue, the Five Hundred members of the Vajra retinue, the Hundred members of the Cūḍapanthaka retinue, and the Thousand members of the Hāritī Rāṣṭrapāla retinue, "All of you protect the country of Aśoka together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以達羅陀國付囑鞞婆達利乾闥婆百眷屬、道路夜叉黃頭夜叉勇健夜叉各千眷屬、跋陀龍王二千眷屬、孔雀毛龍王百眷屬、生解天女毛羅闍利天女各二百五十眷屬：「汝等共護達羅陀國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Darada to the 100 followers of Vaibhātarī and Qianzhong, the 1,000 followers of each of the Wayfaring and Yellowheaded Yakṣas and the Courageous Yakṣas, the 2,000 followers of the Bhadra-nāga-rāja, the 100 followers of the Peacock-Mātṛkā-rāja, and the 250 followers of each of the Sarasvatī goddesses and the Maudrājāli goddesses, saying, "All of you, protect the country of Darada together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以弗梨沙國付囑奪意夜叉戒賢夜叉各五百眷屬、雲腹龍王三百眷屬、離惡鳩槃茶八十眷屬、搔跋質羅天女百眷屬：「汝等共護弗梨沙國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Vrṣāṇasī to 500 members of the retinue of the mind-snatching yakṣas and the disciplined yakṣas, 300 members of the retinue of the cloud-belly dragon king, 80 members of the retinue of Licchaviṃśati, and 100 members of the retinue of the goddess Vṛji: "All of you, protect the country of Vrṣāṇasī together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以伽賒國付囑持華乾闥婆摩睺羅伽乾闥婆各千眷屬、金枳(金支反)持夜叉毘持夜叉各二百五十眷屬、光掌龍王勝奪龍王各五百眷屬、阿樓尼天女華目天女各二百五十眷屬：「汝等共護伽賒國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the land of Gacia with a thousand retinues each of the Flower Bearer and Mahoraga Gandharvas, 250 retinues each of the Golden Kite and Vaiśravaṇa yakṣas, 500 retinues each of the Nāgârjuna Prabhūtaratna, and 250 retinues each of the Araṇyaṇi goddess and the Flower Eye goddess, saying, "All of you, protect the land of Gacia together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以遮居迦國付囑劍婆羅龍王五百眷屬、極惡鳩槃茶百眷屬、那朱波毘舍遮百眷屬、星目羅剎女五百眷屬、天鎧餓鬼將二百眷屬、歇惡夜叉三百眷屬：「汝等共護遮居迦國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the five hundred followers of the dragon king Kambala, the hundred followers of the most wicked Kumbhâṇḍa, the hundred followers of Nājupāpati, the five hundred followers of the starry-eyed Rāṣṭrapāla, the two hundred followers of the general of the gods and the hungry ghosts, and the three hundred followers of the restless yakṣas to "Protect the country of Cājuka together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以簁堤國付囑具足龍王善道龍王各百眷屬、堅目鳩槃茶百眷屬、八毘那耶迦天女一百眷屬、道神天女尸利天女各二百五十眷屬、珂貝天女安住天女各五十眷屬：「汝等共護簁堤國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the fully endowed dragon king Sunetra, the hundred dependents of the dragon king, the hundred dependents of Kanmukha, the hundred dependents of the eight Vinaya goddesses, the 250 dependents of the goddess Śrī, the goddess of the Way, and the 50 dependents of the goddess Kapphiṇa, the goddess of the Anjuna, "Work together to protect the land of Sīti."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以沙勒國付囑髮色天子百眷屬、護國乾闥婆百眷屬、佛護夜叉助雹夜叉各五百眷屬、孔雀項龍王百眷屬、山目龍女五百眷屬、訖利波賒鳩槃茶五百眷屬、持德天女龍護天女各二百五十眷屬：「汝等共護沙勒國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the hundred dependents of the Huṣṭana goddess, the hundred dependents of the state guardian gods and gandharvas, the five hundred dependents of each of the Buddha-guardian yakṣas and Hail yakṣas, the hundred dependents of the Peacock-naped Dragon King, the five hundred dependents of the Yame-eyed Dragoness, the five hundred dependents of Kṛpākubanja, and the 250 dependents of each of the Virtuous Goddesses and Dragon-Guardian Goddesses, "All of you protect the land of Śālêndra together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以于填國土付囑難勝天子千眷屬、散脂夜叉大將十千眷屬、羖羊脚大夜叉八千眷屬、金華鬘夜叉五百眷屬、熱舍龍王千眷屬、阿那緊首天女十千眷屬、他難闍梨天女五千眷屬：「毘沙門王神力所加，共汝護持于填國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān charged a thousand retinues of the god Namsun, 10,000 retinues of the great general Bhaiṣajya, 8,000 retinues of the great ewe-legged yakṣa, 500 retinues of the golden-flowered garland yakṣa, 1,000 retinues of the dragon king Aśvajit, 10,000 retinues of the goddess Anākaniṣṭha, and 5,000 retinues of the goddess Tananjari with the task of guarding the land of Aśvajit by the spiritual power of King Vaiśravaṇa.

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以龜茲國土付囑牟鎧天子千眷屬、黃頭大夜叉千眷屬、厭財羅剎女千眷屬、睺護大夜叉千眷屬、踈齒鳩槃茶千眷屬、尸利遮吒羅剎鹿齒羅剎各五百眷屬：「汝等共護龜茲國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the land of Gṛdhrakūṭa to a thousand retinues of the sons of Muhya, a thousand retinues of the yellow-headed great yakṣas, a thousand retinues of the wealth-averse rājasas, a thousand retinues of the great yakṣas of Hohu, a thousand retinues of the white-toothed kumbhāṇḍas, and five hundred retinues of the deer-toothed rājas of Śṛcāṭa: "All of you, protect the land of Gṛdhrakūṭa together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉。」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly all praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以婆樓迦國付囑騫茶夜叉千眷屬、阿婆迦利鳩槃茶百眷屬、垂乳羅剎千眷屬：「汝等共護婆樓迦國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the country of Vārūḍika to a thousand retinues of Kālākṣa, a hundred retinues of Abhakarikṣa, and a thousand retinues of Pūrṇa Rāṣṭrapāla, saying, "All of you, protect the country of Vārūika together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以奚周迦國付囑王活乾闥婆五百眷屬、奚卑羅龍百眷屬：「汝等共護奚周迦國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the king's living family of five hundred gandharvas and his hundred followers of the Śiphila dragons to protect the country of Śīcuka together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly all praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以億尼國付囑勇健執蠡大夜叉將千眷屬、象耳龍王三千眷屬、吉迦知羅剎女雪池羅剎女各二千五百眷屬：「汝等共護億尼國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān entrusted the land of Ekani to a thousand retinues of the great brave calabash general, 3,000 retinues of the elephant-eared dragon king, and 2,500 retinues of each of the rājñī rājñīs and the snow pond rājñīs, saying, "All of you, protect the land of Ekani together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以鄯善國付囑阿羅知天子百眷屬、阿沙迦夜叉五千眷屬、無著羅剎女十千眷屬：「汝等共護鄯善國土。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed the hundred followers of the Ārāḍmi gods, the five thousand followers of the Āśākya yakṣas, and the ten thousand followers of the unattached rajas, "All of you, protect the Shanshan land together."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以緊那羅國付囑赤目大夜叉十千眷屬、不動鳩槃茶千眷屬：「汝等共護緊那羅國。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān instructed ten thousand retinues of the red-eyed great yakṣa and a thousand retinues of the Akṣobhya Kumbhâṇḍa to "Work together to protect the state of Tantra."

source_sentence: 乃至佛及大眾咸皆讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: The Buddha and the whole assembly praised them, saying, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以震旦國付囑毘首羯磨天子五千眷屬、迦毘羅夜叉大將五千眷屬、法護夜叉大將五千眷屬、堅目夜叉大將五千眷屬、大目夜叉大將五千眷屬、勇健軍夜叉大將五千眷屬、摩尼跋陀夜叉大將五千眷屬、賢滿夜叉大將五千眷屬、持威德夜叉大將五千眷屬、阿荼薄拘夜叉大將五千眷屬、般支迦夜叉大將五千眷屬、婆修吉龍王五千眷屬、須摩那果龍王五千眷屬、弗沙毘摩龍王五千眷屬、呵梨帝鬼子母天五千眷屬、伊羅婆雌大天女五千眷屬、雙瞳目大天女五千眷屬：「汝等賢首！
translation: 爾時，世尊以震旦國付囑毘首羯磨天子五千眷屬、迦毘羅夜叉大將五千眷屬、法護夜叉大將五千眷屬、堅目夜叉大將五千眷屬、大目夜叉大將五千眷屬、勇健軍夜叉大將五千眷屬、摩尼跋陀夜叉大將五千眷屬、賢滿夜叉大將五千眷屬、持威德夜叉大將五千眷屬、阿荼薄拘夜叉大將五千眷屬、般支迦夜叉大將五千眷屬、婆修吉龍王五千眷屬、須摩那果龍王五千眷屬、弗沙毘摩龍王五千眷屬、呵梨帝鬼子母天五千眷屬、伊羅婆雌大天女五千眷屬、雙瞳目大天女五千眷屬：「汝等賢首！

source_sentence: 皆共護持震旦國土。
translation: "They all work together to protect the land of AURORA.

source_sentence: 於彼所有一切觸惱、鬪諍、怨讐、忿競、言訟、兩陣交戰、飢饉、疫病、非時風雨、氷寒毒熱悉令休息，遮障不善諸惡眾生瞋恚麁獷，苦辛澁觸無味等物悉令休息，令我法眼得久住故，紹三寶種不斷絕故，三種精氣得增長故，利益安樂諸天人故，勤加護持。
translation: They will cause rest to all of those things that cause contact, strife, enmity, anger, verbal strife, fighting between two sides, hunger, epidemics, unseasonable winds and rain, cold and heat, hinder unwholesome and unwholesome sentient beings who are hostile and harsh, and cause rest to all things that are painful, pungent, tasteless, and tasteless, so that my Dharma eye can be maintained for a long time, the seeds of the Three Treasures can be introduced without stopping, the three kinds of energy can grow, and the gods and humans can be benefited and comforted, and they'll be diligently safeguarded.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，汝等今世及以後世常得安樂。」
translation: Because of these causes, you'll always attain well-being in this world and the next."

source_sentence: 毘首羯磨天子及與眷屬、迦毘羅大夜叉、法護夜叉、堅目夜叉、大目夜叉、勇健夜叉、摩尼跋陀夜叉、賢滿夜叉、持威德夜叉、阿荼薄拘夜叉、般支迦夜叉，及與眷屬，婆修吉龍王、須摩那果龍王、弗沙毘摩龍王及與眷屬，呵梨帝鬼子母天、伊羅婆雌天女、雙瞳目天女及與眷屬，各作是言：「大德婆伽婆！
translation: The god Vaiśukhara and his retinue, the great Kapila yakṣa, Dharmapālita yakṣa, Mahāmegha yakṣa, Mahāmegha yakṣa, Bhadrapāla yakṣa, Ātharvaka yakṣa, and Pratibhāna yakṣa, and their retinues, the dragon-king Vāsikṣuṇī, the dragon-king Somānagāha, the dragon-king Puṣyapīya and their retinues, the goddess Hāritīputrī, the goddess Airāvaṇa, and the goddess with the two pupils and their retinues each said, "Vṛji Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等共護震旦國土，休息一切鬪諍乃至增長三種精氣。
translation: Together, we'll protect AURORA's land, rest all quarrels, and increase the three kinds of vitality.

source_sentence: 我等勤加護持養育，乃至世尊聲聞弟子三業相應不積聚者，倍復安置護持養育。」
translation: We diligently guard and nurture it, even as the Bhagavān's śrāvaka disciples who don't accumulate karma associated with the three activities are doubly placed in a position to guard and nurture it."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised him, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝應如是護持我法。」
translation: You should thus protect my teaching."

source_sentence: 諸來大眾亦復隨喜讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: Again, the people who came rejoiced and praised, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 「諸仁者！
translation: "Gentlemen!

source_sentence: 我以閻浮提一切國土，付囑諸天、乾闥婆、緊那羅、夜叉、龍王、阿修羅、鳩槃茶、諸天女等，各令安置護持養育一切眾生。
translation: "I've entrusted all of the lands of Jambudvīpa to gods, goddesses, kiṃnaras, yakṣas, dragon kings, asuras, kumbhāṇḍas, and goddesses, each of whom will be installed to protect and nurture all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 是故汝等諸大龍王不得分者，應當容忍莫恨。
translation: Therefore, you great dragon kings who don't share the title should tolerate it and not hate it.

source_sentence: 所謂娑伽羅龍王、阿那婆沓多龍王、伊羅跋龍王、婆樓那龍王、善住龍王、德叉迦龍王、恒河龍王、辛頭龍王、博叉龍王、私陀龍王、提首尼龍王、摩醯謨遮利龍王、金脇龍王、跋致蘇多龍王、弗婆鉢賒龍王、眾色雲龍王、拘那跋帝龍王、阿斯多龍王、遮彌羅龍王、香山龍王、那羅延面龍王、婆婆牟支龍王、那陀叉龍王，如是等一百八十萬諸大龍王，住閻浮提不得分者，應當容忍莫恨。
translation: The dragon-rulers Sāgara, Anavatapta, Airāva, Varuṇa, Sunjū, Takṣaka, Ganges, Sindhu, Bokhara, Sītā, Tishoni, Mahêśvara, Kanpala, Bhadrasudra, Pūrva-vacana, Vasubandhu, Kunabhadra, Asta, Cāmīra, Gandhāra, Gandhāra, Nārāyanir, Vāmaucilin, and Nādakṣa should be tolerated and not resented by the 1.8 million great dragon kings who don't obtain a share of the abode of Jambudvī.

source_sentence: 汝等各住本宮護持養育我之正法，當作利益一切眾生行。
translation: Each of you should stay at your home palace, protect and nourish my right dharma, and undertake to benefit all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，汝等今世及以後世自利利他。
translation: For this reason, you will all benefit yourselves and others in this world and in the generations to come.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 彼諸天、龍、乾闥婆、緊那羅、夜叉、阿修羅、鳩槃茶、天女、羅剎女等，隨其國土昔所住處，彼諸天龍乃至天女，為護彼彼諸國土故，安置養育一切眾生。
translation: Those gods, dragons, gandharvas, kiṃnaras, yakṣas, asuras, kumbhāṇḍas, goddesses, and rāṣṇas lived in their lands in the past, and those gods, dragons, and goddesses placed and nurtured all sentient beings to protect those lands.

source_sentence: 「是故汝等大夜叉王不得分者，應當容忍莫恨。
translation: "Therefore, you great yakṣa kings who don't get a share should tolerate it and not hate it.

source_sentence: 所謂箭毛夜叉、賒羅毘夜叉、迦吒首利夜叉、婆羅目企夜叉、婆羅稚夜叉、婆摩羅夜叉、其梨迦吒夜叉、由梯迦夜叉、其梨呵夜叉、滿面夜叉、迦賒毘提夜叉、護國夜叉、樓迦夜叉、箭爪夜叉、波那流支夜叉、狼爪夜叉、師子怖夜叉、阿樓尼夜叉、修羅闍毘夜叉、阿茶闍梨夜叉、得叉梨師夜叉、灰手夜叉、蘇摩那虎夜叉、羅摩那時夜叉、惡叉尼棄羅夜叉、質多羅夜叉、佛護夜叉，如是等八頻婆羅諸夜叉大將，依閻浮提種種寺舍、園林、泉池、山巖、林藪、樹下安住不得分者，應當容忍莫恨，隨所住處乃至山林樹下各住本處，護持養育我之正法，利益安樂一切眾生行。
translation: 所謂箭毛夜叉、賒羅毘夜叉、迦吒首利夜叉、婆羅目企夜叉、婆羅稚夜叉、婆摩羅夜叉、其梨迦吒夜叉、由梯迦夜叉、其梨呵夜叉、滿面夜叉、迦賒毘提夜叉、護國夜叉、樓迦夜叉、箭爪夜叉、波那流支夜叉、狼爪夜叉、師子怖夜叉、阿樓尼夜叉、修羅闍毘夜叉、阿茶闍梨夜叉、得叉梨師夜叉、灰手夜叉、蘇摩那虎夜叉、羅摩那時夜叉、惡叉尼棄羅夜叉、質多羅夜叉、佛護夜叉，如是等八頻婆羅諸夜叉大將，依閻浮提種種寺舍、園林、泉池、山巖、林藪、樹下安住不得分者，應當容忍莫恨，隨所住處乃至山林樹下各住本處，護持養育我之正法，利益安樂一切眾生行。

source_sentence: 以是因緣，汝等今世及以後世自利利他。
translation: Because of these reasons, you will help yourselves and others in this and future lives.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 彼諸天、龍、乾闥婆、緊那羅、夜叉、阿修羅、鳩槃茶、天女、羅剎女等，隨其國土昔所住處，彼諸天龍乃至天女為護彼彼諸國土故，安置養育一切眾生。
translation: Those gods, dragons, gandharvas, kiṃnaras, yakṣas, asuras, kumbhāṇḍas, goddesses, and rāṣṇas lived in their lands in the past, and those gods, dragons, and goddesses nurtured all sentient beings for the sake of protecting those lands.

source_sentence: 「是故汝等諸阿修羅王不得分者，應當容忍莫恨。
translation: "Therefore, you asura kings who don't share the same fate should tolerate it and not hate it.

source_sentence: 所謂羅睺羅阿修羅王、毘摩質多羅阿修羅王、波羅陀阿修羅王、睒婆利阿修羅王、牟真隣陀阿修羅王、須質多羅阿修羅王、跋稚毘盧遮那阿修羅王、悉利羅耆阿修羅王、黟羅跋支阿修羅王、瞿摩闍毘阿修羅王、毘茶叉阿修羅王、那耶遮利阿修羅王、伽闍彌羅阿修羅王、初羅檀茶阿修羅王、阿斯末羅阿修羅王、迦摩跌知阿修羅王、婆羅乾荼阿修羅王、畢他摩尼阿修羅王、波羅那佉阿修羅王、薩婆鴦伽叉阿修羅王、訖賒婆睺阿修羅王，如是等六萬那由他阿修羅王住閻浮提不得分者，應當容忍莫恨，各住本宮護持養育我之正法，當作利益一切眾生行。
translation: The asura kings Rāhula, Vimalacitra, Pārādhara, Śubhāri, Mucilinda, Sugatara, Vairocana, Sīlapatra, Yīlapatra, Gomajapati, Vairocana, Nāyañjali, Gajamīra, Cūḷadantana, Asmara, Kāmarātchi, Parakanta, Pitamāṇi, Pārāṇakā, Sadvāṅgāthaka, and Kivāhu, these 60,000 other asura kings who live in Jambudvī but don't obtain their share should tolerate and not hate each other, stay in their own palaces, protect and nourish my right teaching, and undertake actions that will benefit all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，汝等今世及以後世自利利他。
translation: For this reason, you will all benefit yourselves and others in this world and in the next.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 彼諸天、龍、乾闥婆、緊那羅、夜叉、阿修羅、鳩槃茶、天女、羅剎女等，隨其國土昔所住處，彼諸天龍乃至天女為護彼彼諸國土故，安置養育一切眾生。
translation: Those gods, dragons, gandharvas, kiṃnaras, yakṣas, asuras, kumbhāṇḍas, celestials, and rāṣṇas lived in their lands in the past, and those gods, dragons, and celestials nurtured all sentient beings in order to protect those lands.

source_sentence: 「是故汝等諸大天女應當容忍莫恨。
translation: "Therefore, you goddesses should tolerate it and not hate it.

source_sentence: 所謂歇大天女、造光天女、地解天女、增護天女、解脫天女、增水天女、少熱天女、淨目天女、饒財天女、寶藏天女、摩尼爪天女、黑繩天女、隨時天女、王頂天女、天水天女、眼目天女、蓮華天女、憂曇婆羅天女、賒尸天女、明炬目天女、善意天女、難勝天女、勝目天女，如是等六十二百千諸大天女，依閻浮提種種塔寺、城邑、聚落、園林、泉池、河邊、山谷、大海邊住不得分者，汝等隨所住處各各於彼護持養育我之正法，汝等於彼所有怖畏、鬪諍、怨讎、飢饉、疫病、他方怨敵、非時風雨、氷寒毒熱悉令休息，遮障不善諸惡眾生瞋恚麁獷，苦辛澁觸無味等物悉令休息，令我法眼久住世間，紹三寶種不令斷絕，三種精氣增長熾然，利益安樂諸天人故勤加護持。
translation: 所謂歇大天女、造光天女、地解天女、增護天女、解脫天女、增水天女、少熱天女、淨目天女、饒財天女、寶藏天女、摩尼爪天女、黑繩天女、隨時天女、王頂天女、天水天女、眼目天女、蓮華天女、憂曇婆羅天女、賒尸天女、明炬目天女、善意天女、難勝天女、勝目天女，如是等六十二百千諸大天女，依閻浮提種種塔寺、城邑、聚落、園林、泉池、河邊、山谷、大海邊住不得分者，汝等隨所住處各各於彼護持養育我之正法，汝等於彼所有怖畏、鬪諍、怨讎、飢饉、疫病、他方怨敵、非時風雨、氷寒毒熱悉令休息，遮障不善諸惡眾生瞋恚麁獷，苦辛澁觸無味等物悉令休息，令我法眼久住世間，紹三寶種不令斷絕，三種精氣增長熾然，利益安樂諸天人故勤加護持。

source_sentence: 以是因緣，汝等今世及以後世常得利益安樂眾生。」
translation: Because of these causes, you will always attain the benefit and welfare of sentient beings in this and the following world."

source_sentence: 時彼六十二百千天女白佛言：「大德婆伽婆！
translation: The 62,000 celestial maidens then said to the Buddha, "Mañjuśrī Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等護持養育佛法，休息鬪諍，增長一切三種精氣，乃至世尊聲聞弟子三業相應無所積聚者，我等勤加護持養育。」
translation: We guard and nurture the Buddha's teaching, rest disputes, and increase all three kinds of vitality, even up to the point where the Bhagavān's śrāvaka disciples' three activities are associated with nothing to accumulate, and we diligently guard and nurture them."

source_sentence: 佛言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: The Buddha said, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 善女人輩！
translation: Good women!

source_sentence: 汝等應當如是護持。」
translation: You should thus safeguard it."

source_sentence: 諸來大眾皆亦隨喜讚言：「善哉，善哉！」
translation: All the people who came also rejoiced and praised, "Good, good!"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊復告一切諸天、乾闥婆乃至諸大天女言：「我今與汝息諸諍訟大陀羅尼心，汝等以此陀羅尼心故，各於己國若曜宿失度，攝諸眾生令得敬信，一切鬪諍悉得休息。」
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed all the gods, godmothers, and goddesses, saying, "Now, I've given you a great dhāraṇī mind for stopping disputes, and because of this dhāraṇī mind, each of you will be able to bring about respect and confidence in sentient beings in your own country if you lose control over your past lives, and all disputes will be brought to rest."

source_sentence: 作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆地夜他　摩陀那　摩陀那　瞿摩陀那阿婆摩多　阿兮摩多　摩陀那佉　阿差摩坻波羅　賒摩帝　阿唎婆三摩摩帝尼佉摩帝　波賒摩帝　蘇遮囉拏摩帝阿毘婆摩帝　阿囉毘婆摩帝　悉陀頞他摩帝　叉婆摩帝　蘇婆呵」爾時，娑婆世界主大梵天王，從坐而起向佛合掌頭面作禮而作是言：「大德婆伽婆！
translation: After he said this, he spoke the dhāraṇī, saying, "Dhṛtiyathā, madana, madana, gomadāna, abharmata, oxymata, madanakha, achamatapāla, cakra, śamatī, Āryasamatī, nikāśamatī, pakra-matī, socara-nāma-ti, abhivamatī, arabhivamatī, siddhârtha-matī, kṣabhā," and then the lord of the sahā world, the king of Brahmā, rose from his seat, bowed his head to the Buddha with his palms together, and said, "Great virtuous Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今復以大陀羅尼，降諸惡龍及惡鬼神，護持國土，遮障一切諸惡眾生。」
translation: Now, I'll also use this great dhāraṇī to subdue all the evil dragons and bad spirits, protect the land, and shield it from all the evil sentient beings."

source_sentence: 作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆地夜他　曇無囉牟嘍囉牟嘍　那伽牟嘍　那伽牟嘍　阿藪囉牟嘍　藥叉牟嘍鳩槃茶牟嘍　浮單那牟嘍　迦吒富單那牟嘍　阿耶婆牟嘍侯呵侯呵牟嘍　呵呵呵呵　牟厨帝藥叉牟嘍囉婆呵囉婆呵　囉婆呵　薩婆烏闍囉婆呵　蘇婆呵」爾時，所有諸天、龍王、鳩槃茶、餓鬼、毘舍遮、富單那、迦吒富單那飲血食肉者，皆悉驚怖憂愁恐懼，向佛合掌頭面禮足，而作是言：「唯願世尊，大悲覆護，我等云何復得存活？」
translation: 作是語已，即說呪曰：「哆地夜他　曇無囉牟嘍囉牟嘍　那伽牟嘍　那伽牟嘍　阿藪囉牟嘍　藥叉牟嘍鳩槃茶牟嘍　浮單那牟嘍　迦吒富單那牟嘍　阿耶婆牟嘍侯呵侯呵牟嘍　呵呵呵呵　牟厨帝藥叉牟嘍囉婆呵囉婆呵　囉婆呵　薩婆烏闍囉婆呵　蘇婆呵」爾時，所有諸天、龍王、鳩槃茶、餓鬼、毘舍遮、富單那、迦吒富單那飲血食肉者，皆悉驚怖憂愁恐懼，向佛合掌頭面禮足，而作是言：「唯願世尊，大悲覆護，我等云何復得存活？」

source_sentence: 佛言：「汝等且莫憂愁，大地所有華果、五穀、藥草眾味清淨未食墮落地者，如是華果眾味精氣汝等食之足得活命。
translation: The Buddha said, "Don't be sad, for if there are flowers, fruits, grains, herbs, and other flavors and tastes of the earth that are pure and haven't been eaten and fallen to the ground, you'll be able to eat the energy of these flowers and fruits and flavors and live.

source_sentence: 若復有人作食清淨遺落在地，汝等亦當食其精氣而自充濟。
translation: If another person makes a clean meal and falls to the ground, you too must eat their vitality to sustain yourselves.

source_sentence: 復有我諸聲聞弟子修禪定者，以己善根呪願，汝等亦得色力精氣豐盛，眷屬朋黨具足勢力。
translation: Furthermore, if there are śrāvaka disciples of mine who practice meditation and wish for their good roots, you'll also attain an abundance of form, strength, and vitality, and your retinues and friends will be fully powerful.

source_sentence: 若有施主施我弟子寺舍、園林、田地舍宅稱名呪願，汝當於彼與欲隨喜護持養育，以是事故汝等宮殿當得增長。
translation: If there's a donor who gives my disciple a temple, a garden, or a dwelling in a field that's called a spell, you must give them what they want, follow their desires, maintain, and nurture them, and as a result, your palace will grow.

source_sentence: 若有施主施我弟子飲食衣服臥具湯藥受取之時稱名呪願，汝亦隨喜，以彼呪願汝隨喜故，汝等便得壽命增長、顏容增長、安樂增長、朋黨增長、勢力增長，汝等晝夜應當精勤護持養育如是施主及以受者。」
translation: If there's a donor who gives my disciples food, clothing, bedding, and medicine, name it a spell and vow that you rejoice in when you accept it, and because you rejoice in that spell, you'll see your life increase, your countenance increase, your happiness increase, your friends increase, and your strength increase, and you should diligently guard and nurture such a donor and his recipients day and night."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊欲重明此義而說偈言：「兩足大法王，　　觀眾作是言：　帝釋汝問我，　　各隨與其分。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān wanted to explain this meaning again and spoke the verse, "The two-legged great king of the Dharma observes the multitude and says, 'Indra, you asked me, and each gave your share.

source_sentence: 天龍鳩槃茶，　　夜叉修羅剎，　閻浮諸國土，　　城邑眾聚落，　曠野諸樹林，　　山巖井泉池，　法眼得久住，　　諸惡令休息。
translation: Devas, dragons, kumbhâṇḍas, yakṣas, sūras, the lands of Jambudvīpa, cities, towns, villages, wilderness forests, mountains, cliffs, wells, and pools, the Dharma eye is made to endure for a long time, and evil is brought to rest.

source_sentence: 豐饒悉可樂，　　為於閻浮提，　四天中鬼神，　　付囑勤護持，　汝等捨眷屬，　　我復更分布。
translation: Abundant and thoroughly enjoyable, they're in Jambudvīpa, which the four gods and the spirits entrust to guard diligently, and I'll distribute them to you as you abandon your retinue.

source_sentence: 莫瞋怒嫉妬，　　與欲當隨喜，　法喜禪味食。
translation: Don't be angry or jealous, but you should delight in your desires and eat the meditative flavors of joy in the Dharma.

source_sentence: 如是諸天眾，　一切皆悉起，　　咸作如是言：　我等為正法，　　護持閻浮提，　聲聞具持戒，　　不為積聚者，　剃頭不持戒，　　欲令法眼增，　我等皆至心，　　勤加護養育。
translation: Thus, all of these gods rose up and said, "We protect Jambudvīpa for the right teaching, uphold the śrāvaka precepts, don't accumulate precepts for the sake of śrāvakas, shave our heads and don't uphold them, and want to increase the Dharma eye, so we all wholeheartedly guard and nurture them.

source_sentence: 導師告彼言：　　正法我滅後，　具滿五百年，　　堅固住解脫。
translation: The guide tells them, "After the correct teaching ceases for me, it will last for 500 years, remaining resolute and liberated.

source_sentence: 五百年禪誦，　　五百造塔寺，　至後五百年，　　堅住於鬪諍。
translation: Five hundred years of meditation, five hundred stūpas and temples are built, and for the next five hundred years, they are firmly rooted in strife.

source_sentence: 後時有剃頭，　　破戒無羞恥，　供養如是輩，　　亦得無量福。
translation: If someone later shaves their head, breaks the precepts without shame, and makes offerings to such a group, they'll also attain measureless merit.

source_sentence: 譬如金無價，　　除金至銀寶，　鍮石偽銅鐵，　　白鑞及鉛錫，　世間若無寶，　　錫鑞為最上。
translation: Like gold that's priceless, it's nothing but gold, jewelry that ranges from gold to silver, bricks, copper, iron, pewter, and lead, if there's no treasure in the world, pewter is the greatest.

source_sentence: 佛寶亦如是，　　最尊獨第一，　次寶辟支佛，　　羅漢餘證果，　得定淨持戒，　　破戒名字僧，　深信求解脫，　　若能供養彼，　不久住忍地，　　必速證菩提。
translation: Thus is the treasure of the Buddha, the most honored and unique, the next most precious, the pratyekabuddha, the remaining realization of the arhat, attainment of concentration and purity, maintaining precepts, violating precepts by name, and the saṃgha, who deeply believe and seek liberation, if they can make offerings to them, they'll soon abide in the stage of patience and will quickly realize bodhi.

source_sentence: 六欲諸天子，　　寶國諸鬼神，　住林乾闥婆，　　海中十大龍，　十大鳩槃茶，　　夜叉十神通，　各住本宮殿，　　護持我正法。
translation: The six celestials of the desire realm, the demons of the jeweled land, the forest gandharvas, the ten great dragons of the sea, the ten great kumbhāṇḍas, and the ten nightjars with their ten supernormal powers each live in their own palace and protect my right teaching.

source_sentence: 餓鬼住曠野，　　毘舍遮空室，　富單依野田，　　迦吒塚間住，　如是各隨喜，　　依分皆護持。
translation: The hungry ghosts live in the wilderness, the empty rooms of Vaiśālī, the fields of Pūrṇa and the ruins of Kaṭṭha, so each takes delight in their own part, and they all guard it according to that part.

source_sentence: 依分不正護，　　復勤惱於他，　我以如是等，　　更轉付餘天。
translation: If they don't correctly guard their basis, they'll again diligently vex others, and I'll further convey this to the other gods.

source_sentence: 諸龍夜叉眾，　　乾闥緊那羅，　天女修羅等，　　羅剎鳩槃荼，　普遍諸國土，　　安置護養育。
translation: The dragons, the yakṣas, the gandharvas, the goddesses, the sūras, and others, the Rāṣṭrapāṇas, and the universal lands are all placed in a protective state.

source_sentence: 迦毘波羅奈，　　摩伽拘薩羅，　般遮鴦伽國，　　蘇摩阿濕婆，　摩偷支提國，　　婆蹉及賒耶，　羅吒憂禪尼，　　羅仛輸盧那，　摩尼讇鞞國，　　乾陀波吒羅，　般提婆樓帝，　　跋尼悉都那，　瞻波鉢浮尼，　　富樓沙富羅，　烏場寄薩梨，　　金性摩都羅，　波斯勅勤土，　　般遮囊伽羅，　尸利耶摩國，　　叵耶藪利迦，　罽賓跋利國，　　佉羅憂羅賒，　伽賒遮居國，　　達羅弗離沙，　簁提沙勒國，　　婆樓兮周迦，　于填及鄯善，　　龜茲緊那羅，　震旦等國土，　　護持令安置。
translation: Kapilavastu, Magakusara, Pancakra, Sumeruṣpa, Mahācakra, Vātsī and Hayagrīva, Rāṣṭacana, Rāṣṭacana, Māṇyamiputra, Gandhāra, Pāṇibalutī, Vātsītunā, Jambudvī, Puruṣapura, Jambudvī, Mathurā, Pārśvajit, Pancakra, Śrīyāma, Īśvārika, Kapphiṇaballi, Kapphiṇaballi, Kāśyaguru, Dravya, Siddhiṣālā, Bhaluṣṭi, Udyāna, Udyāna, Kucheruṣṭhita, and other lands, all of which they protect and enable to be placed.

source_sentence: 於此一切國，　　諸龍無分者，　一百八十萬，　　夜叉等無分，　及八頻婆羅，　　修羅不得分，　六萬那由他，　　天女等無分，　六十二百千。
translation: In all these lands, there are 1,800,000 nāgas without distinction, 1,800,000 yakṣas without distinction, 8 puṇḍaras without distinction, 8 asuras without distinction, 60,000 nayutas without distinction, and 62,000 celestial maidens without distinction.

source_sentence: 我今悉謝汝，　各住本宮殿，　　護持我正法。
translation: Now, I'd like to thank all of you, each of you staying in your own palace to protect my right teaching.

source_sentence: 當與汝神呪，　　遮障惡眾生，　休息諸惱害，　　一切鬪諍訟，　亢旱及水潦，　　病儉諸賊寇，　增長三精氣，　　諸惡令休息，　護持我正法，　　熾然三寶種。
translation: I will give you a spell to shield you from unwholesome sentient beings, to rest all afflictions, all quarrels and disputes, drought and floods, sickness and thief, to increase the three vital forces, to bring evil to rest, to uphold my right teaching, and to blaze the seeds of the Three Treasures.

source_sentence: 聲聞諸比丘，　　三業常相應，　剃頭不持戒，　　一切皆護持。
translation: śrāvaka monks, whose three activities are always associated, shave their heads, don't observe the precepts, and safeguard them all.

source_sentence: 為諸聲聞故，　　具捨諸田宅，　飲食及湯藥，　　一切有所須，　如是諸施主，　　汝等護養育。」
translation: For the sake of the śrāvakas, they give up their lands and houses, their food and drink, and medicine, all of which are needed, so you protect and nurture these generous people."

source_sentence: 大方等大集經卷第五十五
translation: Dafangdengdaji jing, vol. 55
